title: Filip Foto Film
title-description: A Website for the company Filip Foto Film
project-description: This project is curently in progress. It was my final project at Technigo and since then I have expanded the site and tried different solutions.

title: Batcave
title-description: Site with registered users, login and authenticated endpoint
project-description: Week 16 of Technigo bootcamp we learned about how to build a registration flow and authenticate users using tokens. Backend + Frontend Project - Authentication APIThis project's goal was developing an API with authentication in order to implement a login/register interface with authentication. We learned how to authenticate users using tokens and how to store passwords in databases in a secure way. We also created a Frontend with a form to register, login and be able to see restricted content in case the login was successful.

title: Happy Thoughts
project-description: Backend + Frontend Project - Happy ThoughtsAnother backend project where I learnt about allowing user to POST data to my API and then use that data to save new objects in my Mongo database.Then The backend project is connected to the frontend project from previous weeks

title: Labyrinth
title-description: A text based game Labyrinth to practice how APIs work together with Redux.
project-description: Week 12 of Technigo bootcamp we created a game in order to learn more about how to write Redux, like thunks, store and handle response delay.

title: Quiz
project-description: Week 10 of Technigo bootcamp we started working with Redux and global state to build a multiple-choice quiz. The main focus was to learn how to use Redux and also to use its selectors, use dispatch, trigger Redux actions and interact with the store.

title: Movies
title-description: Website listing recently released popular movies.
project-description: Week 8 of Technigo bootcamp we used React and Routes to build multipage application.

title: Survey
title-description: A playful survey about bike commuting
project-description: Week 6 of Technigo bootcamp we continued building with React, introduced the hook useState and created A typeform-like survey.

title: Music
title-description: Website showing new album and single releases.
project-description: Week 5 of Technigo bootcamp we started working with React and components. We built a page based on Spotify API

title: Weather app
title-description: Weather app based on open Weather API
project-description: Week 3 of Technigo bootcamp we started working with APIs to fetch external data to our websites and built a responsive web site using HTML & CSS

title: Guess Who
title-description: A digital version of the classic board game Guess Who.
project-description: Week 2 of Technigo bootcamp we dug deeper into JavaScript: objects, arrays and functions.
